title: Patron Hold Schema
description: Hold schema for patron portal integration

itemId.description: ID of the item being requested

requestLevel.description: Level of the request - Item or Title

instanceId.description: ID of the instance being requested

instance.description: The item that is checked out

requester.description: Copy of some requesting patron metadata (used for searching and sorting), will be taken from the user referred to by the requesterId

barcode.description: barcode of the patron (read only, defined by the server)

requestDate.description: The date when the request was made

expirationDate.description: The date when the request expires

status.description: The status of the hold request

pickupLocationId.description: The UUID of the pick up location

queuePosition.description: The position in the queue for this patron

cancellationReasonId.description: The id of the request reason

canceledByUserId.description: The id of the user that cancelled the request
